answers.answer: Try going to bed earlier or eating fruit whn u want a snack
I'm sorry I know that really *****. I go for my test in 2 weeks and I'm terrified for that to happen. My sister was diabetic with both my niece and nephew and I know she hated it!
Thank u guys. And I try sleeping early I just get that feeling when I am super hungry and is a burning feeling in my stomach. It ***** knowing that u have it. I am just scared that I'll hurt my baby.

If you crave something sweet try peanut butter it has became my bestfriend. It doesn't mess with my sugar levels. If you keep it under control it won't mess with your baby. Good luck I know it's a pain but it will get better.

question: It was found that I have diabetes with the pregnancy, and my suger levels goes up really fast by eating something little. It ***** because I am pregnant and I get hungry at night I know I should of not eat but I can't stop getting midnight Snacks.  What should I do and how can I stop eating so late. I am 27 weeks 2 more days until 28 weeks.
title: I have diabetes
